segments.text: Have you gotten a parking ticket before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't . What about you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I got a ticket a couple of days ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got it for parking in the red zone .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why would you park in the red zone ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had to run in and get something quickly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got the ticket in front of my apartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought that you had your own parking spot ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I had to make it quick .
segments.speaker: S1
